body: 1 Betroffenheit This collaboration between choreographer Crystal Pite and director Jonathon Young explores dark themes including grief, trauma and addiction. Sadler’s Wells, EC2, Tue & Wed 2 Royal Ballet: Mixed Bill  The last programme in the Royal’s current season includes a second outing for Christopher Wheeldon’s finely crafted Within The Golden Hour. Royal Opera House, WC2, Sat to 11 Jun 3 Balletboyz: Life The all-male company shines in this superb double bill of Pontus Lidberg’s emotionally charged Rabbit and Fiction, Javier de Frutos’s wickedly funny musing on his own death. Lichfield, Tue; Cheltenham, Wed; Cambridge, Fri & 4 Jun
webTitle: Three of the best… dance performances this week
